topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
So I got to thinking about how episode three could have saved the entire prequel trilogy

Imagine if they had made some kind of grey morality conflict
What if they had made it so that order 66 wasn't just a sudden "oh yeah evil now"
What if there was something the Jedi order was doing that would have risked innocent lives or something but wasn't necessarily evil
What if the emperor's motivation was more than just "I'm evil tho" (solely within the movies I mean) 
I remember watching clone wars and seeing how commander Cody and Rex were close friends to the Jedi 
Imagine something that was so terrible that they legitimately felt that they needed to kill their friends to save people

It would be cool is what I'm saying
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9
